CommandManual.description: free displays the total amount of free and used physical and swap memory in the system, as well as the buffers and caches used by the kernel. The in‚Äê formation is gathered by parsing /proc/meminfo. The displayed columns are:
CommandManual.example_output: total used free shared buff/cache available Mem: 4000484 2069924 637828 52188 1292732 1591336 Swap: 2875388 724104 2151284
